name: Google Perspective Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Google Perspective Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Google Perspective API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Google Perspective API | (必填项)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: analyzeComment

requestedAttributesUi.name: requestedAttributesUi
requestedAttributesUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Attributes to Analyze | 默认值: {} | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: languages (值: None) - Languages of the text input. If unspecified, the API will auto-detect the comment language. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
